description: We canâ€™t go past a well-seasoned chicken schnitzel. Chives, cheese and peri peri sauce make all the difference to this crispy dish atop mango slaw.
name: Cheat's Chicken Schnitzel With Mango Slaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven grill on high. Spray rack with oil and place over a large foillined baking tray.
Cut chicken fillets in half through the centre to make 2 thinner fillets.

Combine breadcrumbs, cheese and chives in a bowl. Season. Combine mayonnaise with peri peri sauce, if using, in a separate bowl. Spread top side of each fillet with 2 tsp mayonnaise mixture. Sprinkle evenly with breadcrumb mixture, pressing down firmly.
Place chicken, crumbed side up, on rack. Spray well with oil. Grill for 1012 minutes or until golden, crisp and cooked through.
Meanwhile, combine coleslaw, mango, juice of 1 lime half and remaining mayonnaise mixture. Season to taste and toss to combine.
Serve schnitzels with mango slaw and remaining lime, cut into wedges.
